home.headline: Vinos del Valle
home.subline: I'm Selene, a design engineer at FLY, where I craft intuitive user experiences. After hours, I build my own projects.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Selene is a Jakarta-based design engineer with a passion for transforming complex challenges into simple, elegant design solutions. Her work spans digital interfaces, interactive experiences, and the convergence of design and technology.

FLY.achievements: Redesigned the UI/UX for the FLY platform, resulting in a 20% increase in user engagement and 30% faster load times.;Spearheaded the integration of AI tools into design workflows, enabling designers to iterate 50% faster.

Creativ3.achievements: Developed a design system that unified the brand across multiple platforms, improving design consistency by 40%.;Led a cross-functional team to launch a new product line, contributing to a 15% increase in overall company revenue.

Build the Future.description: Studied online marketing and personal branding.

Figma.description: Able to prototype in Figma with Once UI with unnatural speed.

Nextjs.description: Building next gen apps with Next.js + Once UI + Supabase.
